dc_creator_sm: Geographical and Geological Survey of the Rocky Mountain Region (U.S.)
dc_description_s: 1 map : col., mounted on cloth ; 49 x 71 cm|"Julius Bien, Lithographer."|"The base chart was engraved for the Statistical Atlas of the United States."|"To accompany report on the lands of the arid region of the U.S."|"For explanation see chapter on "Land Grants in aid of Internal Improvements."
